Title: Roomless
Writer: Kingman Choi (story), Kingman Choi, Tiny Gary
Actors: Tiny Gary, Leslie Ho, Jayson Li, Gloria Poon
Plot: Wai (Tiny Gary) is a film school graduate who has lost everything in post-1997 Hong Kong. Out of despair and anger, the cynical young man decided to live entirely off government allowance, ...
